text: It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas for Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen. The Brazilian supermodel on Tuesday shared a touching shot of the football star decorating the family Christmas tree with their four - year - old daughter, Vivian. The 36 - year - old stunner, who also has a seven - year - old son named Benjamin with the New England Patriots quarterback, added an emoji of a heart to the caption.
